summary: The customer was having billing issues with their Contoso Wireless service and was being charged for a product they never ordered. After looking into the customer's account, the agent discovered that the customer was being charged for a phone that had been added to their plan as part of a promotional offer. The agent then explained the details of the offer and confirmed that the charges on the customer's current bill would be waived if they switched to the premium plan. The agent then provided instructions on how to switch plans and the customer agreed to do so.
